attributes.action: Place an injunction on Conservative party and the EEC from blocking Brexit
attributes.additional_details: The question was leave the EEC or Stay  and vote for leave was the greater therefor  the sovereign people of the whole of the United kingdoms votes must stand   the people and only the sovereign  people are able to make that decision not government  not EEC.
attributes.background: The referendum held in 2016 was lawful and should / must be carried out as per the result

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's about something the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for.

Only the courts can issue an injunction. The courts are independent of the UK Government and Parliament.
